basics.summary: PhD researcher at Princeton University studying ways to advance science and machine learning, with a focus on modelling dynamical systems, representation learning, and world models. Formally trained as a physicist and applied mathematician; previously at the Australian National University working on numerical experiments and a code to simulate cosmic ray propagation in dynamically evolving turbulent plasma. Experience as a data scientist/computational statistician in information geometry and biology.
